segments.text: The dress looks beautiful . Can I touch it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , miss , it's not allowed unless you want to buy it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . What about the dress over there ? I would like to try it on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , here you are . The fitting room is behind the curtain .
segments.speaker: S2
